variables.name: TYPE_ALL_RIGHTS_REMOVED
variables.comment: * All of the rights information associated with all DRM schemes have been successfully removed.

variables.name: TYPE_DRM_INFO_PROCESSED
variables.comment: * The given DRM information has been successfully processed.

variables.name: DRM_INFO_STATUS_OBJECT
variables.comment: * The key that is used in the attributes HashMap to pass the return status.

variables.name: DRM_INFO_OBJECT
variables.comment: * The key that is used in the attributes HashMap to pass the * {@link DrmInfo} object.

methods.name: public int getUniqueId()
methods.comment:
* Retrieves the unique session identifier associated with this object.
     *
     * @return The unique session identifier.

methods.name: public int getType()
methods.comment:
* Retrieves the type of information that is associated with this object.
     *
     * @return The type of information.

methods.name: public String getMessage()
methods.comment:
* Retrieves the message description associated with this object.
     *
     * @return The message description.

methods.name: public Object getAttribute(String key)
methods.comment:
* Retrieves the attribute associated with the specified key.
     *
     * @return One of the attributes or null if no mapping for
     * the key is found.
